reportDateAndTime.description: The date and time when the report was generated

participantIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantIdentificationCategory.$comment: Only categories (Intermediário Full), (Participante de Liquidação), and (Intermediário Light) are allowed to include an account. Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode.

buySellIndicator.description: Indicates whether the trade is a buy or sell
buySellIndicator.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalBuySellIndicatorCode

financialInstrumentIdentificationExchang.description: Identifier code of the exchange where the instrument is listed

tickerSymbol.description: Letters that identify stocks traded on stock exchange

segment.description: Market segment - first level of market classification in post-trading process
segment.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSegmentCode

participantPreviousIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantPreviousIdentificationCategor.$comment: Only categories (Intermediário Full), (Participante de Liquidação), and (Intermediário Light) are allowed to include an account. Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode.

accountPreviousIdentification.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

accountPreviousType.description: Account type identification that will be registered
accountPreviousType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSecurityAccountTypeCode

participantOriginIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantOriginIdentificationCategory.$comment: Only categories (Intermediário Full), (Participante de Liquidação), and (Intermediário Light) are allowed to include an account. Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode.

accountOriginIdentification.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

accountOriginMasterIdentification.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

accountOriginType.description: Account type identification that will be registered
accountOriginType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSecurityAccountTypeCode

participantDestinationIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantDestinationIdentificationCate.$comment: Only categories (Intermediário Full), (Participante de Liquidação), and (Intermediário Light) are allowed to include an account. Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode.

accountDestinationIdentification.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

accountDestinationMasterIdentification.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

accountDestinationType.description: Account type identification that will be registered
accountDestinationType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSecurityAccountTypeCode

breakingRuleType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalBreakingRulesTypeCode

breakingRuleDelayResponsibility.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalBreakingRulesResponsibilityCode

breakingRuleReason.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalBreakingRulesReasonCode

breakingRuleDateTime.description: Breaking Rule Date and Time in ISO format

allocationStatus.description: Processing status of the allocation instruction
allocationStatus.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalAllocationInstruction

compressionGroupIndicator.description: Indicates if the operation is derived from block capture
compressionGroupIndicator.$comment: When true, the allocation was created as part of a block trade that was split into multiple allocations. This affects how the allocation is processed and reported.

averagePriceGroupIndicator.description: Indicates if the operation is derived from an average price allocation group
averagePriceGroupIndicator.$comment: When true, the trade was part of an average price group

averageExecutionTime.description: Average execution time of the average price allocation group
